info.name: GMAYL
info.description: Not finished, and not perfect, but better - for me - as current themes. (I wrote under 10 + 10 minutes.)
info.additionalInfo:
Tested with FF.

Note:

    Lines 3,4 you can change font whatever you want. The bold font-weight is 600, but I used 500 because a Roboto bold is too strong.

    If you want to see scrollbars, delete hiding definitions from bottom.

    I recommend use compact density.

Changelog:
- v.0.0.3 Remove icons from left block (only visible then menu collapsed)
